AVSEC Order No. - 07/2022

Subject: Prompt communication in the event of any incident/ accidents or
purported acts of unlawful interference with civil aviation operations - reg.

In exercise of the powers conferred by Sub-Section 1(A) of Section SA of
the Aircraft Act, 1934 (XXII of 1934), read with rule 3 (b) of the Aircraft (Security)
Rules, 2011, Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation Security (DG, BCAS), for
the purpose of the safety of passengers, crew, ground personnel and the general
public in all matters relating to safeguarding against acts of unlawful
interference with civil aviation, and in order to upgrade the efficacy of control
and response system, the Aircraft Operators operating to/from India, the Airport
Operators, Airport Security Group (CISF/APSU) and other entities concerned
with civil aviation security shall ensure to promptly inform the following officers
by quickest possible means about any incident/ accident or acts/ purported acts
of unlawful interference in-flight or at the airport:
